item.title: ABOUT
item.content:encoded:
About

I’m a seventeen year old from Warwick, Rhode Island. I have been doing theater since I was fifteen in my sophmore year of high school and I have been in ten productions since. Some of my work includes musical theater and straight plays but along with performing I also have worked on my passion for choreographing. Dance has always been my stronger suit, I love to interpret emotion and character through body language and movement.

As well as theater I also grew a passion for cheerleading and singing in choirs throughout highschool. I would spend my entire day at school, going from rehersal to practice, every day. When I have free time, my go to activites are finding new coffee shops around me to try and going thrifting. I love experimenting with fashion and crafts as I also like to make scrap books! I am also most definitely a foodie and love to try new restaurants or food types near me whenever I get the chance.

Some of my all time favorite musicals are Chicago, Cabaret, Anything Goes, Funny Girl, and West Side Story. I love taking inspiration from other artist and creators to help my own creativty grow. I always try to find local schools and theaters productions around me to go support and sometimes thats how I get to meet more people involved in theater around me.

Theater has grown into not just a passion but a life style for me and I cant wait to see what the future of my career has in store for me!

Thank you!
